synopsis.text:
He is an office worker named Himuro, a descendant of the legendary Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. His icy powers are as unpredictable as the weather, unleashing blizzards and snowstorms whenever his emotions run high. Despite his chilling abilities, Himuro is a warm and amiable individual with a soft spot for cats and flowers, even if his frosty touch keeps them at a distance.

At the heart of his emotional storm is Fuyutsuki, his composed and somewhat eccentric colleague. Her kindness and rational solutions to his icy predicaments only fuel the snowstorm of love within him. Although his feelings for Fuyutsuki are as transparent as ice to his colleagues, she remains blissfully unaware. Yet, Himuro remains undeterred, determined to win her heart and repay her kindness.

As they navigate their professional lives, their relationship gradually evolves. Fuyutsuki, intrigued by her mysterious coworker, finds herself drawn to Himuro's warmth beneath his frosty exterior. Despite their mutual curiosity, their awkwardness in matters of love keeps them at a distance. Will they overcome their icy barriers and find love in the snowstorm of their emotions?

Join Himuro and Fuyutsuki in this heartwarming workplace romance, where love blooms amidst blizzards and the chill of winter meets the warmth of human connection.
